actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the secretary of interior to construct, operate, and maintain the polecat bench area of the Shoshone extensions unit, Missouri River Basin project, Wyoming.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Polecat Bench area of the Shoshone extension unit, Missouri River Basin project, Wyoming. Authorizes such appropriations as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the secretary of interior to construct, operate, and maintain the polecat bench area of the Shoshone extensions unit, Missouri River Basin project, Wyoming.
